page.shortlink: guides xdialog setting the initial focus
page.description: By default the control that has focus when a dialog is opened is the first control on the dialog, however, you may specify a different control. The {initial_focus} command is used to do this. Here is an example where the third edit control in this dialog box gets the initial focus:

section.description: Notice that the third control has focus.
